message.entry: Colormap must be a c-by-3 matrix. If you want to convert a 2-D grayscale image, use im2gray instead.
Invalid data type. Colormap must be a double matrix with values in the range [0, 1].
Invalid data type. Arguments must be numeric.
Color image must be an m-by-n-by-3 array.
Input must be an m-by-n-by-3 array or a c-by-3 matrix.
